page.title: 10Finedon Donna's Special Day
page.content: On Tuesday May 28th I woke up and Nan was in the bedroom looking out of the window.She was staying with us because our mum was in hospital having another baby. When I was dressed I went downstairs to have breakfast.I had some cornflakes.After breakfast my sister, my nan and I went to the stores to get some lunch for us all.Dad looked after the other children.When it was near lunchtime my dad went to the hospital to visit my mum.He came back and told us she had had a little boy.My youngest sister cried because she wanted a girl. Dad said that my mum was not allowed home until the next day. We called the baby Michael Trefor Gareth.My dad said that when Michael was older he would teach us all how to play badminton and snooker. I now had 3 sisters and 2 brothers.
